channel.title: Crysis crashing
channel.description:
I finally have a PC capable of running Crysis (on high settings mind you), but the game crashes on me in almost the exact same spot every time. After jumping from the plane and landing in the water, the game freezes after I get to the surface. The WASD to move dialogue pops up and the squad leader starts to say something, and the the video freezes. The audio track plays out, but everything else is frozen. Then Win7 pops up a message to close the program because it has stopped responding. The game runs smooth as silk up to this point, and I can't figure out what the problem is...
Anybody else have this problem/fix it?
Specs: Windows 7 Ultimate 32-bit Asus EAH5770 1GB GPU Intel Core i5 750 CPU 4GB OCZ RAM Asus P7P55D-E Pro Mobo

item.title: Crysis crashing
item.dc:creator: sudpuzzer
item.description:
I finally have a PC capable of running Crysis (on high settings mind you), but the game crashes on me in almost the exact same spot every time. After jumping from the plane and landing in the water, the game freezes after I get to the surface. The WASD to move dialogue pops up and the squad leader starts to say something, and the the video freezes. The audio track plays out, but everything else is frozen. Then Win7 pops up a message to close the program because it has stopped responding. The game runs smooth as silk up to this point, and I can’t figure out what the problem is…

Anybody else have this problem/fix it?

Specs:
Windows 7 Ultimate 32-bit
Asus EAH5770 1GB GPU
Intel Core i5 750 CPU
4GB OCZ RAM
Asus P7P55D-E Pro Mobo

From DxDiag:
